column2: worlddata%>%group_by(Country)%>%mutate(Total_servings=sum(beer_servings,spirit_servings,wine_servings))%>%group_by(Region)%>%select(Region,`Happiness Score`,Total_servings)%>%summarize(mean_total_servings=mean(Total_servings),mean_happiness_score=mean(`Happiness Score`))%>%arrange(desc(mean_happiness_score))%>%ggplot(aes(x=mean_happiness_score, y=mean_total_servings,color=Region))+ scale_color_brewer(palette="Paired")+ labs( x = "Mean Happiness Score", y = "Mean Alcoholic Servings",title ="Happiness Equivalent to Alcholic Servings?", caption = "The following visualization depicts the average number of alcholic servings per region along with the average happiness score for each region.")+geom_point(size=5)+theme_minimal()+xlim(4,7.5)+ylim(0,600)
